casebody.data:
JOHN BOWMAN v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 23995)

Schaller, West and DiPentima, Js.

Submitted on briefs January 23 — officially released March 2, 2004 Per Curiam.

The habeas court denied the petition for a writ of habeas corpus and denied the petitioner’s request for certification to appeal to this court. After a careful review of the record and briefs, we conclude that the petitioner has not demonstrated that the issues are debatable among jurists of reason, that a court could resolve the issues in a different manner or that the questions are adequate to deserve encouragement to proceed further. See Simms v. Warden, 230 Conn. 608, 616, 646 A.2d 126 (1994).

The appeal is dismissed.
